participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is down-to-earth and practical, with a love for adventure and a passion for his work.
participant_1.background: i've been working since i was sixteen years old. i'm a construction worker. my favorite food is mexican food. my favorite band is aerosmith. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc.

participant_2.name: Priya
participant_2.personality: Priya is independent and creative, often seeking new experiences and challenging societal norms.
participant_2.background: my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool.
